name: DiscoverTheElements
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: discover the elements
des:
Discover the Elements is a mind-expanding exploration of the periodic table of the elements, aimed at young people studying science in school, and anyone with a general interest in science. As you explore, you will collect sets of elements, building your own periodic table.

This skill is based on the internationally best-selling book and award winning app The Elements, by Theodore Gray, Popular Science Magazine’s Gray Matter columnist. The elements are what we, and everything around us, are made of. 

You will discover fascinating facts, figures, and stories of the elements – there’s a lot more to the periodic table than a bunch of numbers and letters! 

The quiz sections of this skill are intentionally challenging. So we recomend taking notes while you listen and interact.
 
FEATURES:
- Detailed and current information from Wolfram|Alpha
- Fun stories and fascinating facts
- Engaging introduction and on-boarding for new users 

HELPFUL HINTS:
- If you need help at any point in the skill just say "help!"
- Wondering how you're doing? say "status update" or "how am I doing?"

Keep an eye out for updates as we add new sets to collect!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
